description: Detects a suspicious printer driver installation with an empty Manufacturer value
false_positives: Alerts on legitimate printer drivers that do not set any more details in the Manufacturer value
name: Suspicious Printer Driver Empty Manufacturer
query: ((winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\Control\\Print\\Environments\\Windows\ x64\\Drivers* AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\Manufacturer* AND winlog.event_data.Details:"\(Empty\)") AND (NOT ((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\CutePDF\ Writer\ v4.0\\*) OR (winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(*\\VNC\ Printer\ \(PS\)\\* OR *\\VNC\ Printer\ \(UD\)\\*)))))
author: Florian Roth
